snippet: The deal allows Clear Channel to save money in the fast-growing, but unpredictable, world of Internet radio, while giving Taylor Swift and her label access to an income stream in traditional radio they have long coveted.
abstract: The deal allows Clear Channel to save money in the fast-growing, but unpredictable, world of Internet radio, while giving Taylor Swift and her label access to an income stream in traditional radio they have long coveted.

headline.main: Clear Channel and Taylor Swift's Label Agree to Reinvent Royalty System
